UnitedBitcoin

Blockchain hard fork is a complex process requires deep understanding of blockchain technical skills, computing power as well as ecosystem support. Bitpie will support all hard fork token if 1. Mainnet is online and stable 2. 2-way Replay protection is implemented3. Fair distribution and no private key import needed to claim.

The mission of UnitedBitcoin is to re-utilize this sleeping, and provide more value to better serve mankind. The vision of UnitedBitcoin is to create a global constant-value currency system of a unified joint credit association, and to create a currency that supports smart contracts.

Project name United Bitcoin(UB)
Block height 498777
Hard-fork time 2017/12/11
Replay protection Support
Block size 8M
Consensus algorithm SHA256（ASIC）
Total supply Unknown
Ratio to BTC Eligable Bitcoin users will get UB as 1:1
Pre-mining no-premining
Official Website http://www.ub.com
Project Team Wouter van der Schagt
